DataElement.preferredName: Lung Non-Small Cell Carcinoma Most Recent Line of Therapy PD1 Inhibitor PD-1 Ligand Inhibitor Include Yes No Coded Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response indicating whether or not the most recently NSCLC line of therapy included PD-1 inhibitors or PD-1 ligand inhibitors.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Lung Non-Small Cell Carcinoma Most Recent Line of Therapy PD1 Inhibitor PD-1 Ligand Inhibitor Include
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A group of at least three distinct histological types of lung cancer, including non-small cell squamous cell carcinoma, adenocarcinoma, and large cell carcinoma. Non-small cell lung carcinomas have a poor response to conventional chemotherapy._Nearest to the present._The sequence of therapies administered to a patient.:An agent designed to interfere with the activity of programmed cell death protein 1 (PD1). PD1 inhibitors block T-cell apoptosis and act as non-specific activators of the immune system._Any agent that binds to any of the ligands for the receptor programmed cell death protein 1 (PD-1; PD1); programmed death ligand 1 (PD-L1; CD274) and 2 (PD-L2; CD273)._Add as part of something else; put in as part of a set, group, or category.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Lung Non-Small Cell Carcinoma Most Recent Line of Therapy
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A group of at least three distinct histological types of lung cancer, including non-small cell squamous cell carcinoma, adenocarcinoma, and large cell carcinoma. Non-small cell lung carcinomas have a poor response to conventional chemotherapy._Nearest to the present._The sequence of therapies administered to a patient.

Concepts.definition: A group of at least three distinct histological types of lung cancer, including non-small cell squamous cell carcinoma, adenocarcinoma, and large cell carcinoma. Non-small cell lung carcinomas have a poor response to conventional chemotherapy.
The sequence of therapies administered to a patient.

Property.preferredName: PD1 Inhibitor PD-1 Ligand Inhibitor Include
Property.preferredDefinition: An agent designed to interfere with the activity of programmed cell death protein 1 (PD1). PD1 inhibitors block T-cell apoptosis and act as non-specific activators of the immune system._Any agent that binds to any of the ligands for the receptor programmed cell death protein 1 (PD-1; PD1); programmed death ligand 1 (PD-L1; CD274) and 2 (PD-L2; CD273)._Add as part of something else; put in as part of a set, group, or category.

Concepts.definition: An agent designed to interfere with the activity of programmed cell death protein 1 (PD1). PD1 inhibitors block T-cell apoptosis and act as non-specific activators of the immune system.
Any agent that binds to any of the ligands for the receptor programmed cell death protein 1 (PD-1; PD1); programmed death ligand 1 (PD-L1; CD274) and 2 (PD-L2; CD273).
Add as part of something else; put in as part of a set, group, or category.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Yes or No response to a question coded as 1 (Yes) or 2 (No).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the most recent line of therapy for NSCLC include anti-PD-1 or anti-PD-L1 therapy?
